title: Putin’s Crimean gamble: Russia, Ukraine, and the new Cold War (Brookings Institution)
text: ( Source : Brookings Institution ) Since the time of Catherine the Great , Crimea has been a global tinderbox. Most recently, the world was stunned when the forces of Russian President Vladimir Putin invaded and seized Crimea in March 2014 . In
